mapper.select: SELECT s.pkg_id, s.sch_day, a.acm_id, a.acm_nm, v.vehc_id, v.vehc_nm, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sch_comb sc WHERE s.pkg_id = sc.pkg_id AND s.sch_day = sc.sch_day ) tour_count FROM sch s, vehc v, acm a WHERE s.pkg_id = #{pkgId} AND s.acm_id = a.acm_id AND v.vehc_id = s.vehc_id ORDER BY s.sch_day

SELECT s.pkg_id, s.sch_day, a.acm_id, a.acm_nm, v.vehc_id, v.vehc_nm FROM sch s, vehc v, acm a WHERE s.pkg_id = #{pkgId} AND s.sch_day = #{schDay} AND s.acm_id = a.acm_id AND v.vehc_id = s.vehc_id ORDER BY s.sch_day
SELECT sc.tour_id FROM sch s, sch_comb sc WHERE s.pkg_id = #{pkgId} AND s.sch_day = #{schDay} AND s.pkg_id = sc.pkg_id AND s.sch_day = sc.sch_day ORDER BY s.sch_day
